title: Minimalist fitness blog with post-creation endpoint for “Gao Fitness Experience”

requirements.text: Implement backend data model and endpoints for blog posts so posts can be created via an endpoint that requires a title and content, and posts can be fetched for display on the site.

quotes: The way to create a post is thorough a endpoint you are going to create, it requires an title and content.

acceptanceCriteria: A persistent BlogPost type exists with at least: id, title, content, createdAt.
There is an update endpoint to create a post that rejects empty title or empty content.
There is a query endpoint to list posts for the frontend (newest-first).
Created posts remain available after canister upgrades (stable storage).

requirements.text: Create a minimalist, modern, appealing blog frontend branded as “Gao Fitness Experience” that displays the list of posts (title, date, content) and updates when new posts are created.

quotes: I want to create an blog website where I can post my fitness experience.
The blog should be minimalist and appealing with modern design. The name of the website is “Gao Fitness Experience” .

acceptanceCriteria: The site header/hero prominently displays the site name “Gao Fitness Experience”.
The homepage renders a list of blog posts fetched from the backend, showing at minimum title and content (and created date if available).
Empty-state is handled gracefully when there are no posts (English text).
All user-facing text is in English.

requirements.text: Add a site-wide footer that includes an English “All rights reserved” notice using the website name as the brand: “Gao Fitness Experience”.

quotes: The footer should have all right reserved to my brand which is the website name.

acceptanceCriteria: Footer is visible on all pages/views.
Footer text includes the exact brand name “Gao Fitness Experience” and an “All rights reserved” notice in English.

requirements.text: Define and apply a consistent minimalist visual theme (colors, typography, spacing, and layout) across the entire UI with a modern editorial feel; avoid blue/purple as primary colors.

quotes: The blog should be minimalist and appealing with modern design.

acceptanceCriteria: A coherent theme is applied consistently across header, post list, and footer.
Primary palette is not blue/purple (unless used only as minor accents).
Typography and spacing are consistent and readable on mobile and desktop.

constraints: Backend must remain a single Motoko actor in backend/main.mo.
Do not edit frontend files under frontend/src/components/ui or other immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT; compose them instead if needed.
No third-party authentication integrations; only Internet Identity is supported (do not add auth unless explicitly requested).
nonGoals: Image uploads or image generation for posts.
Admin UI for creating posts (post creation is via backend endpoint as requested).
Comments, likes, tags, categories, search, or rich-text editor unless explicitly requested.
